State of the Sea:: EQ-05S, 75E-88E          : Showers or thundershowers at most places.
Other sea areas           : Showers or thundershowers at several places.
04S-10S, 60E-100E      : South-easterly / (30-40) kmph; gusting up to (50-60) kmph.
Other sea areas            : Slight to moderate.

column2: *Temporary strong gusty winds and rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.
